mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.product_id, w.created_at, p.name as product_name, p.cover_image, (SELECT MIN(price) FROM product_sku WHERE product_id = p.id AND status=1) as min_price, (SELECT SUM(stock) FROM product_sku WHERE product_id = p.id AND status=1) as total_stock FROM wishlist w LEFT JOIN product p ON w.product_id = p.id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY w.created_at DESC
